Coalition talks: Christopher Luxon, David Seymour and Winston Peters likely to continue three-way meetings as policy differences persist https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/leaders-likely-to-continue- Three-way-meetings-as-policy-differences-persist/HIUFN57J4VGPFJCA5UIUG4XKTU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/leaders-likely-to-continue- Three-way-meetings-as-policy-differences-persist/HIUFN57J4VGPFJCA5UIUG4XKTU/ Adam PearseIt's uncertain whether a coalition deal can be reached by the end of this week. Wed, 15 Nov 2023 19:46:32 +0000 National's Nicola Willis arrives at the Cordis hotel in Auckland as coalition negotiations continue. November 16, 2023. Photo / Michael Craig
Parliament protests: High-ranking police officer faces civil action in relation to two arrests https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/parliament-protests-high-ranking-police-officer-faces-civil-action-in-relation-to-two-arrests/SXHMXHK2ARALFGPLZYBSNNMRJY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/parliament-protests-high-ranking-police-officer-faces-civil-action-in-relation-to-two-arrests/SXHMXHK2ARALFGPLZYBSNNMRJY/ Ethan GriffithsThe officer was criminally investigated, but police chose not to lay charges. Wed, 15 Nov 2023 16:00:00 +0000 Cassin was kneeled on by the officer. She claimed the weight was centred on her neck, but the officer says it was her back and shoulder area. Photo / Supplied

Wed, 15 Nov 2023 16:00:00 +0000 A patched member of the New Zealand Hells Angels and a convicted meth cook were arrested during a DEA sting in Romania.

‘Unauthorised’: NZ authors’ books used to train big tech AI https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/unauthorized-nz-authors-books-used-to-train-big-tech-ai/FZT5MZEMCNHLXNTPCXWAX7YP64/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/unauthorized-nz-authors-books-used-to-train-big-tech-ai/FZT5MZEMCNHLXNTPCXWAX7YP64/Chris KeallCan they fight back? Wed, 15 Nov 2023 16:00:00 +0000 Big tech AIs like ChatGPT have ingested millions of books. That allows them to summarise novels, or even imitate an author's style. But experts say the key purpose of the exercise is to teach the AIs how to write and deliver more fluent responses. Image / Getty Creative

Photo / Michael Craig
